Uses of Interface
com.nkoiv.mists.game.Global

  • Packages that use Global 
    Package Description
    com.nkoiv.mists.game  
    com.nkoiv.mists.game.gameobject  
    com.nkoiv.mists.game.world  

    • Uses of Global in com.nkoiv.mists.game

      Classes in com.nkoiv.mists.game that implement Global 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Mists
      Mists Class is used to initialize the window and launch the game.

    • Uses of Global in com.nkoiv.mists.game.gameobject

      Classes in com.nkoiv.mists.game.gameobject that implement Global 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Creature
      Creature is a "living" MapObject As such, they get (at least some) AI-routines
      class  Effect
      Effects are more or less temporary MapObjects.
      class  MapObject
      MapObjects are basically anything that can be encountered on in a Location (dungeon/town/whatever) This generic class is meant for things that don't fit in various subclasses.
      class  PlayerCharacter
      PlayerCharacter is currently designed to be unique per game TODO: Implement "World owner" as the main target instead of player, so that several players can coexist in a single game
      class  Structure
      Structures are MapObjects with varying collision boxes A single structure may have some parts of it causing collision, others not TODO: utilize ImageView viewport to show pieces from same file

    • Uses of Global in com.nkoiv.mists.game.world

      Classes in com.nkoiv.mists.game.world that implement Global 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Location
      Location is the main playfield of the game.
      class  MapGenerator
      MapGenerator makes maps for Locations.
